title: Streaming games/commentary. Gold 3 currently going for plat this stream.
body:
Finished last season in Plat but ended up getting placed in silver V this season, I've decided to stream the climb to diamond to help myself/others learn a bit about the game and the differences between leagues. The theory behind this is that while doing commentary I am forced to analyze my own mistakes which allows myself any others to learn from them. 

Feel free to stop by whether you're bronze or even challenger, as always I appreciate any tips and will answer questions to the best of my ability. If you'd like to see a particular champion played I will do so if possible, just let me know via chat. 

Other info can be found at my twitch, follow for automatic updates as I don't always post on the forums prior to streaming.
